segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is disgusting with all that water spilling out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing like a broken fountain, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman just stands there drying a plate, foot in the filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's spreading, probably full of soap and grime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are making it worse, climbing for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is tilting in that wet mess— gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's digging into the jar with who knows how dirty hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, probably stepping in the water soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies in a cabinet, but now crumbs will be everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinets— what a sloppy disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks clean and nice, unlike this pigsty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a careless, messy scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean this up before it's unbearable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor floors will be ruined from the standing water.
segments.speaker: PAR
